guest_info.name: Joel Schaub
guest_info.title: Vice President of Lending
guest_info.specialty: Giving back part of his commission to buyers

problems_addressed.solution_summary: Seek advice from experienced agents who have weathered past cycles and focus on consistency and discipline.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Staying engaged with clients during slow periods
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Spend time authentically engaging with clients on social media to build goodwill and maintain visibility.
Regularly update client information and set reminders for personal events to strengthen relationships.

target_avatars.relevance: New agents can learn the importance of consistency and relationship building.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Focus on building authentic relationships and maintaining consistency to grow your business.

target_avatars.relevance: Intermediate agents can benefit from strategies to engage clients during slow periods.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Use slow periods to engage with your database and refine your skills.

clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Demonstrates a specific, actionable tactic for engaging with clients.

key_tactics.context: Spend time daily commenting on clients' posts to build goodwill.
Provide updated market analyses to clients to keep them informed and engaged.

quotable_insights: Intimacy has to be earned, and the way you do that is by showing up.
The market is like the weather; you can't control it, but you can control your effort.

resources_mentioned.name: Chat GPT
resources_mentioned.context: Used for gathering market insights and understanding both sides of buying/selling arguments.

resources_mentioned.name: Real Geeks
resources_mentioned.context: Recommended as a technology partner for real estate agents to generate more business.

episode_summary: In this episode, Joel Schaub discusses the importance of consistency and relationship building in real estate. He shares actionable strategies for engaging with clients during slow periods and emphasizes the value of understanding market cycles. The episode also highlights the use of technology, like Chat GPT, for gaining market insights and improving communication with clients.
